name: Cutout
description:
Available now on the Google Play store!

Cutout is a simple minimalist inspired platformer-puzzle game.

Control your cube fit into the hole that is coming towards you! Sweet, short and simple gameplay allows anyone to pick up and go at anytime. Recommended for all-ages.

Features
-Multiple Game modes
-Compare your records with friends
-Multiple control schemes to accommodate varied playstyles

Created in Unity by Andy Bennett

*As an additional feature, the first 10 players in the world to achieve a score of 100 on Insane difficulty will have their name along with their respective country flag posted on the Hall of fame which will be added to the main menu in a future patch*

Check out the link below for further details!
https://maliciousent.wordpress.com/2015/10/15/cutout-hall-of-fame-rules/
